name: Mythic Skald
text: The myths told and retold by the people of the world have power, changing the past even as they shape the future. Warriors gather around fires to swap tales about the Great Bear and the World Serpent, while shamans whisper portents revealed to them by the Fate Weaver to any who will listen. Though such stories live large in those who revere the oral tradition of storytelling, they are not guarded, not secret, and any who would listen and learn from them can touch their great power.

features.hero'sBlood(11thLevel): Whenever an ally within 5 squares of you bloodies an enemy with an attack, you can grant a different ally within 5 squares a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls on its next attack in this encounter
features.mythicAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an extra attack and hit with that attack, each ally within 5 squares that can see you gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier
features.primalVirtue(16thLevel): When you use majestic word on yourself or an ally, the target also gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn

flavorText: Listen! I tell the tale of heroes past and present
